content: > a free version is available on the > blog here 1 **about the pattern** this is a modern cowl pattern with 6 sizes from child to adult made in a novel tunisian crochet stitch pattern inspired by knit stitch patterns with slip stitches it features elegant texture made up of special tunisian crochet clusters that are disposed in columns divided by reverse stitches **skill level** intermediate in tunisian crochet due to working in different row and creating clusters **size** there are 6 sizes that range between head sizes of 41 and 69 cm between 16 and 27 with about 4 cm or 1 5 ease **easy read** the easy read or mobile friendly version respects the following requirements 24 point arial font 26 and 28 point and bold for headings black text white background left justified 1 inch margins no columns page numbers bottom left no charts all abbreviations explained in the list all images have alt text 1 https //yarnandy com/tunisian-crochet-stitch-pattern-silver-spruce-cowl/
